elements.label: Kevin
elements.description: He works in the lobby. He looks like a friendly fellow.

elements.label: The Book of Dreams
elements.description: This book is said to make your dreams come true. Is that what you want? Are you prepared for the consequences?

elements.label: Dust covered Corridor
elements.description: The pamphlet led you here. It looks just like any other corridor in this place, but the pamphlet seems to consider it important.

elements.label: Library Pamphlet
elements.description: A pamphlet giving a presentation on the Library. There's a map on its flipside.

elements.label: Scrawled directions
elements.description: A handwritten map guiding you to The Library.
